attributes.additional_details: Myself and many other parents struggle to supply uniform due to the price! People are in debt because of this and it’s not acceptable. The quality is poor, overpriced and no choice of where you can shop.
attributes.background: Cap the prices and help parents

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for a similar action: 

Provide school uniform grants across England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592125

Ban mandatory school uniforms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591532
